original_text: Now Elihu had waited before speaking to Job because they were older than he.
korean_text: 엘리후는 그들의 나이가 자기보다 여러 해 위이므로 욥에게 말하기를 참고 있다가

sentences.original_text: Now Elihu had waited before speaking to Job
because they were older than he
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 그보다 나이가 많았기 때문이다
